abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Highway Project consists of
            the following principal elements: a) construction of the
            Yabayo-Duekoue-Man road (219 km) and a branch of this road
            from Pinhou to Guiglo (19 km); b) construction of the
            Bouake-Katiola road (49 km); c) supervision by consultants
            of works under Parts a and b above; and, d) detailed
            engineering of about 300 km of roads.
